body:
Ben and Hoang,

Those dropbox files are too old and I'm thinking of taking them down soon.  Nearly [all files on Hydra](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/) are up-to-date and I would recommend starting from here rather than the Dropbox files:

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&for...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=EnergyPlus_Simulation)

-Chris
